title: Ghana Unlocks IMF’s $385 Million After Fifth Review of Program
description: Ghana has unlocked $385 million disbursement from the International Monetary Fund, following a successful review of its extended credit facility program.
content: Ghana has unlocked $385 million disbursement from the International Monetary Fund, following a successful review of its extended credit facility program.
